body_html:
Yes, I use Android Studio 2.2.3 to import tensorflow project,
and follow the instructions listed in this page,
and also use command line below to build the apk
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo

then run this project, the error "couldn't find libtensorflow_demo.so" appears...
after refering to some suggestions, I new a folder "libs" and put so file in, but the problem is still there..

thanks

body:
Yes,  I use Android Studio 2.2.3 to import tensorflow project,
and follow the instructions listed in this page,
and also use command line below to build the apk
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo

then run this project, the error "couldn't find libtensorflow_demo.so" appears...
after refering to some suggestions, I new a folder "libs" and put so file in, but the problem is still there..

thanks
